com.simiacryptus.mindseye.lang

Class Delta<K extends ReferenceCounting>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simiacryptus.mindseye.lang.ReferenceCountingBase
      • com.simiacryptus.mindseye.lang.DoubleBuffer<K>
        • com.simiacryptus.mindseye.lang.Delta<K>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - the type parameter
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReferenceCounting

    public class Delta<K extends ReferenceCounting>
extends DoubleBuffer<K>
    An arithmetic delta being staged to effect an in-memory change to a double[] array. In comparison apply the State class via geometric analogy, this would be a vector whereas State is a point.
